nodes.label: I work as a Software Engineer at TechCorp, focusing on backend development with Python and FastAPI.
nodes.full_content: I work as a Software Engineer at TechCorp, focusing on backend development with Python and FastAPI.

nodes.label: I now work as a Senior Engineering Manager at TechCorp, leading a team of 8 engineers across backend
nodes.full_content: I now work as a Senior Engineering Manager at TechCorp, leading a team of 8 engineers across backend and frontend.

nodes.label: I'm currently working on building a scalable API platform for our microservices architecture.
nodes.full_content: I'm currently working on building a scalable API platform for our microservices architecture.

nodes.label: The API platform uses FastAPI with PostgreSQL database, Redis for caching, and Docker for containeri
nodes.full_content: The API platform uses FastAPI with PostgreSQL database, Redis for caching, and Docker for containerization. We're aiming for 99.9% uptime.

nodes.label: I'm learning about AI and machine learning fundamentals through online courses. Just started with ba
nodes.full_content: I'm learning about AI and machine learning fundamentals through online courses. Just started with basic neural networks.

nodes.label: I've now completed 3 AI courses and built my first machine learning model using TensorFlow. Currentl
nodes.full_content: I've now completed 3 AI courses and built my first machine learning model using TensorFlow. Currently working on a computer vision project.

nodes.label: I enjoy photography, especially landscape and street photography. I shoot with a Canon EOS R5.
nodes.full_content: I enjoy photography, especially landscape and street photography. I shoot with a Canon EOS R5.

nodes.label: For landscape photography, I focus on golden hour lighting and use a tripod for long exposures. I al
nodes.full_content: For landscape photography, I focus on golden hour lighting and use a tripod for long exposures. I also shoot in RAW for better post-processing control.

nodes.label: My fitness goal is to run a marathon by the end of the year. Currently running 20 miles per week.
nodes.full_content: My fitness goal is to run a marathon by the end of the year. Currently running 20 miles per week.

nodes.full_content: I follow a high-protein, balanced diet with lots of vegetables. I eat 5 small meals a day to maintain energy for training.

nodes.label: I maintain a strict sleep schedule of 8 hours per night, going to bed at 10 PM and waking at 6 AM fo
nodes.full_content: I maintain a strict sleep schedule of 8 hours per night, going to bed at 10 PM and waking at 6 AM for my morning run.

nodes.label: Currently reading 'Designing Data-Intensive Applications' by Martin Kleppmann. Great insights on dis
nodes.full_content: Currently reading 'Designing Data-Intensive Applications' by Martin Kleppmann. Great insights on distributed systems and databases.

nodes.label: Also reading 'The Lean Startup' by Eric Ries to better understand product development and startup me
nodes.full_content: Also reading 'The Lean Startup' by Eric Ries to better understand product development and startup methodologies.

nodes.label: Planning a 2-week trip to Japan in spring to see cherry blossoms in Tokyo and Kyoto.
